testcase.name: Verify if place is being added using AddPlaceAPI
testcase.system-out: Given Add place Payload with "Mannat House" "29, side layout, cohen 09" "French-IN".passed When user calls "AddPlaceAPI" with "POST" Http request......................passed Then the API call got success with status code 200..........................passed And "Status" in the response body is "OK"...................................passed And "Scope" in the response body is "APP"...................................passed And verify place_ID created maps to "Mannat House" using "getPlaceAPI"......passed

testcase.name: Verify if place is being added using AddPlaceAPI 2
testcase.system-out: Given Add place Payload with "Shreyas House" "29, side layout, cohen 09" "Gujrati".passed When user calls "AddPlaceAPI" with "POST" Http request......................passed Then the API call got success with status code 200..........................passed And "Status" in the response body is "OK"...................................passed And "Scope" in the response body is "APP"...................................passed And verify place_ID created maps to "Shreyas House" using "getPlaceAPI".....passed

testcase.name: Verify if place is being deleted using deletePlaceAPI
testcase.system-out: Given Delete place payload..................................................passed When user calls "DeletePlaceAPI" with "POST" Http request...................passed Then the API call got success with status code 200..........................passed And "Status" in the response body is "OK"...................................passed
